page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE PLUMSTEAD
page.content: My family is a nice family. I have got 1 brother and 2 sisters. We might be moving soon because my mum might be getting married. Sometimes me and my sisers row but we like each other really. My eldest sister is getting a flat soon with her boyfriend. I like where we live because I have lots of friends. We all go to bed at ten and we don't mind.We have a bath when we want. At the moment my dad is in hospital because he works on scaffolding and the gun blew up what he was using.He tumbled over the top. As he was falling he tried to grab on to things but he just couldn't grab anything.He had a serious accident.I hope he will be alright.Anyway, back to my family.We have got a cat called Misty,a hamster called Pibbles and we are looking after my aunty's dog called Sowy.We all get on together.
